title: Yeah Garen needs a nerf guys totally.
body:
The dude who has literally no dashes, blinks, gap-closers and got his only mobility spell nerfed to oblivion somehow managed to get to you and destroyed your face.

Of course he's broken, it's totally not the low elo scrubs who can't peel for shit.

replies.body: Its not just low elo, every division is seeing garen with 50%+ winrates

> [{quoted}](name=RangerlUSAl,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=95ZtrjhV,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-24T22:33:23.647+0000)
>
> Its not just low elo, every division is seeing garen with 50%+ winrates

Are the winrates over 52%?
Yes.  Over the last few days it's been around 54-55%.

> [{quoted}](name=Intronile,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=95ZtrjhV,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-08-24T22:38:51.876+0000)
>
> Are the winrates over 52%?

some of them yes

http://champion.gg/champion/Garen/Top


yeah, those plat+ low elo scrubs who lose to garen. so bad, letting him have a 55% winrate.
I think the True damage ult on the villain is the broken thing. It's like a Darius ult with no stacks required.
it wouldn't be so bad if kills against garen themselves didn't count towards establishing the villain, that way you wouldn't be punished for destroying him in lane beforehand

Maybe if tanks didn't get their armor nerfed and are getting completely melted by ADC's and sated junglers. Garen is too tanky and deals too much damage (Black cleaver, Titanic Hydra and now he does True damage). He is getting nerfed and that is Riots decision. He is overtuned when we all thought he would suck and Darius would be OP.
If you can call what Garen is getting a nerf while keeping a straight face you are one lucky guy.

These are barely even nerfs honestly. Everyone is acting like nerfing Garen in his current state is the worst possible thing ever even though he is the 2nd highest win rate right now. Only beat by Skarner and he managed beat Heimer. Nerfing Garen before this patch would have been outrageous but honestly he will need some damage tweaking and not just these movement speed love taps.

Personally I fell Garen's win rate would even out to a lower level if Riot waited a while, but until Riot announces something that actually resembles a nerf I'll let them do their tiny changes without worrying.

My guess is they are actually moving him away from being a beginner champ by weakening his lower level play in an attempt to adjust his win rate without actually touching his current power.

> [{quoted}](name=ThatAtheist,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=95ZtrjhV,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-24T22:38:00.321+0000)
>
> Maybe if tanks didn't get their armor nerfed and are getting completely melted by ADC's and sated junglers. Garen is too tanky and deals too much damage (Black cleaver, Titanic Hydra and now he does True damage). He is getting nerfed and that is Riots decision. He is overtuned when we all thought he would suck and Darius would be OP.

"Maybe if tanks didn't get their armor nerfed and are getting completely melted by ADC's and sated junglers. Garen is too tanky" sort of a contradicting statement there.

OT: I'm genuinely curious how he got so strong (especially since his early game is for all intents and purposes, weaker than it was previously; it was hard enough for him in specific lane matchups pre-rework)

One would think you can simply kite him with MS slows of some kind, even if he hits 600 MS with deadman's plate and youmuu's, MS slows make speed boosts fall off VERY quickly. Yet for some reason that seems to not be happening.

Edit: Also new Rylai's is a thing so theres that.

When someone can deal 1.5k true damage without truly building anything then its a problem. The only issue Garen has is having his ult skill deal true damage to villains. Other than that he's in a good position.

They don't want him to

"SPIN TO WIN"

Garen does have a dash.
His Q gives his next autoattack a 50 unit dash.






Doesn't really count though
I have yet to go against any Garen, they've always been on my team and they do a ton of damage but we are usually ahead so i haven't had the experience to see if he's actually that broken.

Literally every time a Garen would jump onto me, I'd hit him with a Stun while having Rylai's and he'd no longer be able to get to me.

It's not that hard, guys.
